General.Name: Dnonce Tech Bhd
General.Description: D'nonce Technology Bhd., an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture, sale, and distribution of advanced packaging materials, electronics products, and consumables. It operates through three segments: Healthcare, Electrical and Electronics, and Other Industries. The company offers end-to-end packaging and design solutions for healthcare, and supply of goods and services for automotive, food and beverage, and other manufacturing industries. It also provides precision polymer engineering and cleanroom services; operates as a contract manufacturer of electronic components; and wholesales industrial chemicals. In addition, the company engages in the manufacture and distribution of product labels; and property development activities. It operates in Malaysia, Thailand, Singapore, Denmark, Indonesia, the United States, Europe, Vietnam, China, the United Kingdom, and internationally. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Georgetown, Malaysia.
